Module src
Package BoardDrawingGame.Entities

Class Board

java.lang.Object
BoardDrawingGame.Entities.Board
public class Board extends Object
The Board class represents the game board for a Dots and Boxes game. It stores information about the horizontal and vertical lines on the board.
Author:
Ali Kaan Uysal, Bas Van Dijk

      Constructs a new Board with the specified grid size.

  • Method Details

    • getHorizontalLines

      public boolean[][] getHorizontalLines()
      Gets the two-dimensional array representing the horizontal lines on the board.
      Returns:
      The 2D array of horizontal lines.

    • getVerticalLines

      public boolean[][] getVerticalLines()
      Gets the two-dimensional array representing the vertical lines on the board.
      Returns:
      The array of vertical lines.

    • markLine

      public void markLine(String horizontalOrVertical, int horizontalIndex, int verticalIndex)
      Marks a line on the board based on the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      horizontalOrVertical - The type of line to mark ("H" for horizontal, "V" for vertical).
      horizontalIndex - The horizontal index of the line.
      verticalIndex - The vertical index of the line.

    • markLine

      public void markLine(int serverIndex)
      Marks a line on the board based on the specified server index.
      Parameters:
      serverIndex - The server index to determine the type and position of the line to mark.

    • isValidMove

      public boolean isValidMove(Line line)
      Checks if the specified Line object represents a valid move.
      Parameters:
      line - The Line object to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the move is valid.
